page.title: 12Population
page.content: The population of Southport is about 86,000. Older people come here to retire. Also older people come here to the many rest homes. Holiday tourists come here to the fun fair, beach, theatre and other items of entertainment. Most of the population have a car or some other means of transport, although older people like going by bus. Just under one quarter of the population of Southport is of a pensionable age. As a result of this there are many rest homes. By comparison just over a sixth of Merseyside the population of an O.A.P. age. Most of the population have some kind of a pet. The most popular pets are dogs, cats, birds and fish.
